contexts.context: ...only cost of membership comes when you use our <mark>health</mark>, healing, and blessing shrines -- modest fees...
Lay healers gather ingredients for <mark>health</mark> and healing potions, and minister to the sick...
...companions came in great numbers to inquire after his <mark>health</mark>, yet each one helped himself to a share...
To restore <mark>health</mark> to the afflicted and wounded, combine in equal...
...Roris grants Roris' Bloom, for fortifying the body's <mark>health</mark>.
